name: LiVES
description: LiVES is a video editor. User can easily add special effects, all kinds of files in audio and video formats. And it has special effects editing, video conversion, video playback and other functions.

en_US.description: LiVES is a video editor. User can easily add special effects, all kinds of files in audio and video formats. And it has special effects editing, video conversion, video playback and other functions.
en_US.name: LiVES

zh_CN.description: LiVES是一款视频编辑器，它能让用户简单的添加视频特效、各种视频和音频格式文件，同时还具有视频特效编辑、视频转换、视频回放等功能。
zh_CN.name: LiVES
